name: Break The Code (GameJamSesc)
description:
Description:

Our game is a Puzzle Stealth where the player is a hacker and the enemy is the Defense System.

Game Rules:

- one player at each time

-  downloadable game

How to play:

- press play

- use the keys W-A-S-D on the keyboard for movements Up-Down-Left-Right; arrows ←↑→↓ or joystick control

- get the Item and avoid the Defense System

- when the player gets the Item he becomes the same color of the room and makes it difficult to be found by the Defense System

- this version of the game has 4 rooms

- if the player (hacker) is seem and gets caught by the guards, the game starts over (penalty)

Credits

Team (development): Rodrigo, Hamilton, Felipe, Weber, Miguel, Neusa.

Music author and Sound Effects: Felipe

Assets of Art: Hamilton

Gamedesgin: Miguel, Hamilton, Felipe.

Programming: Rodrigo, Weber, Miguel.

Production: Neusa.

Thanks to:

Sesc 24 de maio - ETA and RevStudio

São Paulo, March 2018
